Question & Options:
Which of the following statements is true regarding the film *Logan*?
Options:
A. a) Principal photography for Logan took place in New Orleans.
B. b) Hugh Jackman starred as Logan in the film.
C. c) New Orleans was a significant filming location for Logan.
D. d) Hugh Jackman confirmed his role in Logan before its release.
Correct Answer: a) Principal photography for Logan took place in New Orleans.

Question & Options:

B. Hugh Jackman
C. Patrick Stewart
D. Dafne Keen

Which of the following statements are true regarding the involvement of McCusker in the film *Logan* and its relation to the X-Men franchise?
Options:
A. a) McCusker contributed to the structural breakdown of scenes in Logan.
B. b) Logan is a film that diverges from the traditional X-Men narrative style.
C. c) McCusker was not involved in any X-Men related projects.
D. d) Logan is considered a different sort of X-Men film compared to previous installments.
Correct Answer: a) McCusker contributed to the structural breakdown of scenes in Logan. and d) Logan is considered a different sort of X-Men film compared to previous installments.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements accurately describes the involvement of McCusker in the film *Logan* and its post-production?
Options:
A. a) McCusker discussed his work on breaking down scenes for Logan.
B. b) McCusker had a role in the creation process of Logan.
C. c) Post-production was highlighted as important by Chas Jarrett during discussions with McCusker.
D. d) McCusker was solely responsible for the visual effects in Logan.
Correct Answer: a) McCusker discussed his work on breaking down scenes for Logan., b) McCusker had a role in the creation process of Logan., c) Post-production was highlighted as important by Chas Jarrett during discussions with McCusker.
